001package fr.univavignon.pokedex.api;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Collections;
005import java.util.Comparator;
006import java.util.List;
007
008public class Pokedex implements IPokedex {
009
010    List<Pokemon> pokemonList;
011
012    IPokemonFactory pokemonFactory;
013
014    IPokemonMetadataProvider pokemonMetadataProvider;
015
016    public Pokedex(final IPokemonFactory pokemonFactory, final IPokemonMetadataProvider pokemonMetadataProvider) {
017        this.pokemonList = new ArrayList<Pokemon>();
018        this.pokemonFactory = pokemonFactory;
019        this.pokemonMetadataProvider = pokemonMetadataProvider;
020    }
021
022    /**
023     * Returns the number of pokemon this pokedex contains.
024     *
025     * @return Number of pokemon in this pokedex.
026     */
027    @Override
028    public int size() {
029        return pokemonList.size();
030    }
031
032    /**
033     * Adds the given {@code pokemon} to this pokedex and returns
034     * it unique index.
035     *
036     * @param pokemon Pokemon to add to this pokedex.
037     * @return Index of this pokemon relative to this pokedex.
038     */
039    @Override
040    public int addPokemon(final Pokemon pokemon) {
041        pokemonList.add(pokemon);
042        return pokemonList.size() - 1;
043    }
044
045    /**
046     * Locates the pokemon identified by the given {@code id}.
047     *
048     * @param id Unique pokedex relative identifier.
049     * @return Pokemon denoted by the given identifier.
050     * @throws PokedexException If the given {@code index} is not valid.
051     */
052    @Override
053    public Pokemon getPokemon(final int id) throws PokedexException {
054        for (Pokemon buffer : pokemonList) {
055            if (buffer.getIndex() == id) {
056                return buffer;
057            }
058        }
059        throw new PokedexException("Pokemon does not exist !");
060    }
061
062    /**
063     * Returns an unmodifiable list of all pokemons this pokedex contains.
064     *
065     * @return Unmodifiable list of all pokemons.
066     */
067    @Override
068    public List<Pokemon> getPokemons() {
069        return Collections.unmodifiableList(pokemonList);
070    }
071
072    /**
073     * Returns an unmodifiable list of all pokemons this pokedex contains.
074     * The list view will be sorted using the given {@code order}.
075     *
076     * @param order Comparator instance used for sorting the created view.
077     * @return Sorted unmodifiable list of all pokemons.
078     */
079    @Override
080    public List<Pokemon> getPokemons(final Comparator<Pokemon> order) {
081        List<Pokemon> sortedList = new ArrayList<>(pokemonList);
082        sortedList.sort(order);
083        return Collections.unmodifiableList(sortedList);
084    }
085
086    @Override
087    public Pokemon createPokemon(final int index, final int cp, final int hp, final int dust, final int candy) throws PokedexException {
088        return pokemonFactory.createPokemon(index, cp, hp, dust, candy);
089    }
090
091    @Override
092    public PokemonMetadata getPokemonMetadata(final int index) throws PokedexException {
093        return pokemonMetadataProvider.getPokemonMetadata(index);
094    }
095}
